column3: Aligned alcohol policy with WHO guidelines.
Approved the Regulation on Control of the Production, Marketing and Consumption of Alcoholic Beverages.
Approved of the Regulation on Control of the Production, Marketing and Consumption of Alcoholic Beverages.
Held first Alcohol Awareness Month and first Dry Month.
Continuing to revise health messages on alcohol containers [D of Health, 24/8/14 --to come into force after 18 months).
Published a report of the Uganda 2014 WHO STEPS survey.
